var.name: contentType
var.desc: The content type of the span.

constant.name: CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN
constant.desc: A type of unknown. It is not yet known what the type of the span is.

constant.name: CONTENT_TYPE_TABS_AND_SPACES
constant.desc: A type of tabs and spaces whitespace.

constant.name: CONTENT_TYPE_RETURN
constant.desc: The type of a whitespace span, consisting of a newline.

constant.name: CONTENT_TYPE_NON_WHITESPACE
constant.desc: The type of a non whitespace span.

var.name: tabCount
var.desc: If contentType is TABS_AND_SPACES, then this value is the count of tabs.

var.name: spaceCount
var.desc: If contentType is TABS_AND_SPACES, then this value is the count of spaces.

var.name: prevCharWas13
var.desc: If the previous return char was 0xD.
